name: The hole (Studio not-so studio)
description:
The Hole

You work for a company that cleans oceans with holes. You control the hole. Get your paycheck!   

Where I got the art

Recycle items by Clint Bellanger

Fish Pack By Kenny

Rolling Ball Assets by Kenny

Controls

Arrow keys/WASD = movement

Collect soda cans!

Watch out for fish, you don't want to touch them!

Don't let any soda cans escape!
